Text: I’m grateful that the threat has been cleared, and I am working with my colleagues in Congress to condemn these threats of violence and ensure the safety and security of HBCUs across the country.
The recent threats made against Hampton University and other HBCUs during Black History Month are incredibly disturbing and warrant a thorough investigation.

My thoughts are with the students, faculty, and staff at Hampton University as they endured a bomb threat today. 

https://t.co/t6URi6hwV3

We urge Secretary Austin to ensure that TRICARE provides improved access to free tests for our armed forces and military families.

Providing access to COVID testing is a key component to ending this pandemic, and it is unfair that military service members and their families are unable to access these tests at no out-of-pocket cost as their civilian counterparts are.

ICYMI: @RepDebDingell and I led 43 of our colleagues in sending a letter to Secretary Lloyd Austin urging the Department of Defense to update TRICARE’s policy to cover at-home COVID-19 tests for active-duty service members and military families. 

📰: https://t.co/KvbPrtx4Gc

Vladimir Putin’s choice to manufacture conflict and once again violate Ukraine’s sovereignty has created a serious security crisis in Eastern Europe, and he must be held accountable.
